snippet.title: Old Towers Genesis Trailer - Mega Cat Studios Video Game
snippet.description:
A massive tower stands before you, and in that tower is untold treasures. Rocket through it with laser precision in this all new title for the Sega Genesis by Retro Souls, and published by Mega Cat Studios.

Check it out and more at: https://www.megacatstudios.com

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Old Towers is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by SEGA Enterprises Ltd, SEGA Corporation, SEGA Holdings Co, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the SEGA Mega Drive console, and is not affiliated with SEGA Enterprises Ltd, SEGA Corporation, or SEGA Holdings Co.

SEGA® and MEGA DRIVE®  are trademarks of SEGA Holdings Co.
